task_summary: Robot must reach the scissors while avoiding obstacles.

task_long_description.overview: In this episode, a robotic arm is tasked with reaching scissors positioned on a cluttered tabletop, navigating around visible obstacles (e.g., boxes and a cup). The robot must perceive the scissors, avoid collisions by aligning from above, then approach and ultimately reach the target object. Constraints include the avoidance of objects blocking direct access, as seen in the camera frames.
preconditions: Scissors are present and visible or detectable in the workspace
Workspace contains other objects as obstacles (e.g., boxes, cup, tray)
Robot is powered on and initialized
stepwise_plan: Check if scissors are visible; if not, perform a scan
Move above scissors, considering obstacle avoidance
Align and approach the scissors, maintaining safe clearance
Perform a lateral move to step around obstacles if required
success_criteria: Robot reaches the scissors without contact with obstacles
Final gripper position is above or at the scissors
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Scissors not found—robot retries scanning up to 3 times
Failure: Obstacle encountered—recovery via re-alignment or lateral move
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when the robot successfully reaches the scissors or exhausts all attempts

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if scissors are currently visible by the sensor or vision system
Scans workspace for scissors up to 3 times using a spiral pattern
Move above the scissors with 0.1m clearance
Align with scissors, approaching within a precise 5mm tolerance
Perform lateral move on x axis (10cm) to avoid detected obstacle
Move directly towards the scissors for task completion

failure_modes: Failure to detect scissors within timeout or attempts
recovery_strategy: Retry scanning for scissors up to 3 times
Lateral avoidance maneuver before final approach
assumptions: Instruction mentions obstacle avoidance; frames clearly show physical obstacles
Scissors assumed to be the metallic/white handled tool visible in each frame, located between black tray and white cup
MoveDelta axis/distance selected to avoid the prominent obstacle in the approach path per frame sequencing

expected_success_criteria: Robot arm maneuvers around obstacles and ends up above or at the scissors, no contact with obstacles
